word_mean: 对称的，均称的：属于对称的或显示对称性的
在化学中，指化合物所含原子或基团在分子中是以等距排列的

sentence.Network_en: The symmetrical design of this church makes it very beautiful.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座教堂的对称性结构使它十分美丽.

sentence.Network_en: The two wings of the building are exactly symmetrical.
There is nothing more harmonious, more symmetrical, than this group of structures.
sentence.Network_cn: 再没有比这—群建筑更调谐更匀称的了!

entry.def: If something is symmetrical, it has two halves which are exactly the same, except that one half is the mirror image of the other.

example.ex: ...the neat rows of perfectly symmetrical windows.
example.tran: 一排排整齐而且完全对称的窗子

means.word_mean: 1. having similarity in size, shape, and relative position of corresponding parts
2. exhibiting equivalence or correspondence among constituents of an entity or between different entities

stems_affixes.word_buile: geography地理[学]+ical……的→adj.地理学的,地理的

symbol符号,记号,象征+ical……的→adj.表示象征的,符号的
tyranny暴政,苛政,专治+ical……的→tyrannical暴虐的,残暴的
